product_name: Jack BlackAll-Over Wash for Face, Hair & Body
summary: SummaryJack Black's All-Over Wash is a multipurpose, sulfate-free wash that eliminates dirt and sweat without stripping skin and hair of essential moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-tasking pH balanced cleanser works great for body, face and hair.Botanicals leave a fresh scent without being too fragranced or heavy.Perfect for that all-over clean in your morning shower.Dermatologist TestedCruelty FreeFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensAlcoholColorantsKey IngredientsJojoba Protein: Provides water-binding properties that help maintain moisture in skin and hair.Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5): Provides lightweight moisturization that softens and smooths skin and hair.Cocamidopropyl Betaine: Coconut-derived surfactant that provides gentle, effective, sulfate-free cleansing and leaves skin and hair soft and hydrated.Sea Kelp: The most nutrient rich of all seaweed species, skin benefits include superior hydration and soothing properties.Shea Butter: Contains essential fatty acids to hydrate and moisturize dry skin and hair.Item 2289315How To UseTo use, generously lather All-Over Wash on body, face and hair. Use a netted sponge or washcloth for maximum lather. Rinse.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower/ Tournesol) Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea/KaritÃ©) Butter, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Protein, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea/ThÃ© vert) Extract*, Laminaria Digitata Extract*, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil/Basilic) Leaf Extract*, Punica Granatum Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit/Pamplemousse) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary/Romarin) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower/Tournesol) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice/Riz) Bran Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean/Graine de soja) Sterols, Glycol Stearate, Glycol Distearate, PEG-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Sodium Benzoate, Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sodium Phytate, Polyquaternium-7, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Retinyl Palmitate, Sorbic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Coumarin, Citronellol, Citral, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde.*Certified Organic/CertifiÃ©s BiologiquesAs part of Jack Black's commitment to always offer the highest quality products, some of the ingredients in their formulations may be updated from time to time. The ingredient list shown here may vary from product packaging, depending on the location and timing of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: No more bar soap
reviews.comments: Really enjoying the fresh, long lasting deep clean from this cleanser.  Although I also bought the lotion a week later the cleanser leaves my skin soft, not dried out.

reviews.headline: Multi use
reviews.comments: My husband loves this wash. I also use it in the shower as a facial cleanser.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product again and again for my husband
reviews.comments: The All-Over wash from jack Black is fantastic. It declutters the shower since only one product is needed for my husband and secretly I use it too at times. I love the scent and it really leaves both hair and skin clean and subtle.

reviews.headline: Best overall Body Wash
reviews.comments: Great thick consistency, Refreshing Scent, without the unpleasant (when not desired), "menthol chill" , Hydrating & excellent for most sensitive skin types.

reviews.headline: Perfect for my husband
reviews.comments: This is my hubby's favorite face wash. He loves it because he really feels like it cleans his face and beard and he has been pretty picky about his face washes.

reviews.headline: Glad Ulta has this product.
reviews.comments: My husband says this is the best all over.

reviews.headline: All time favorite wash!
reviews.comments: I've been buying this wash for years now, it's a fresh but musky smell. It is thick and lathers really well. One pump and your good.

reviews.headline: All in One for every man!
reviews.comments: We received some samples and that was it for my husband. This all in one is perfect and easy for any man to use. The scent is fresh and no reactions for sensitive skin. Wash your hair, your body with this huge bottle. A most have in our house!

reviews.headline: My boyfriend's go - to product!  He loves it!
reviews.comments: I introduced my redneck boyfriend to this line and this product he can not live without!  From head to toe, this product is great!

reviews.headline: Sticky
reviews.comments: This soap sticks to the skin in... globs? It doesn't clean thoroughly. It is hard to rinse off.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again and again
reviews.comments: My husband loves this all over wash and I love the smell

reviews.headline: Husband Loves
reviews.comments: Husband uses as his daily wash product.

reviews.headline: Clean and fresh
reviews.comments: Use loofah sponge ðŸ§½

reviews.headline: I keep this in my shower and travel bag.
reviews.comments: I use it regularly and on travel. Even my brother has begun using it.

reviews.headline: Nice clean, fresh scent
reviews.comments: This Jack Black body wash has a mild scent. It makes you feel nice and clean. If you like to use cologne quite frequently. The scent of the body wash won't overpower the scent of the cologne. Most Old Spice body washes do that. Buf this body wash won't. It's very good to use before a date if you want to have a fresh scent. Then put on your favorite cologne. So, if you haven't used this body wah yet. Give it a try. All Jack Black products do a great job. If you haven't used any. Look at your local store. They're worth your money.

reviews.headline: My family loves this product.
reviews.comments: My husband and son love this product.

reviews.headline: My man LOVES and so do I!!!
reviews.comments: Very hydrating and amazing scent!! Will be buying again for sure!!

reviews.headline: Not very special
reviews.comments: I bought this body wash because it was vegan and also it had good reviews. I mean yea smells good but nothing special about it as I expected it as it said in reviews. Its pricy for a normal body wash. Wont buy it again

reviews.headline: husband lives for this
reviews.comments: ðŸ˜ just plain love this product

reviews.headline: Aromatic Therapy
reviews.comments: Bought this body wash because of its wonderful smell. It smells like a fresh mojito tastes': citrus mint mixed with clear rum. The smell in the lather is much stronger than what's left on your skin afterward, which is a good thing. The strong hit of  eucalyptus wakes you up, and the soothing aroma of rosemary, citrus, and musk relax your aches and pains away. Love it. Wish the price were a bit more reasonable, but, what can you do.

media.headline: I would buy this product again & again for my husband.
media.caption: when in Rome

media.headline: Only hair/body wash my husband likes.
media.caption: A staple in our shower.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Look, its not everyday a man talks about the soap he uses. So today is that day. Jack Black really is awesome; great products...period! But this one takes the cake. I love my Molton Brown body washes for the mornings before work and weekends. But my Jack Black ALL OVER is my closer. Its my after workout wash, weekend morning shower, anytime/go to wash. Its fresh, cooling and gives man that "I feel great" sensation. You know what I mean!

I buy this stuff only in the tube because its easy to throw into a gym bag and go. I would consider the big bottle, but I love my Molton Brown and buying this stuff in bulk will only make me use more of it in one session. I dont use a sponge or loofah with this product; I use my bare hands and it really goes on smooth and goes a long way with just a quarter size squeeze at a time. Also, it feels great for that after workout shower; the eucalyptus real cools the skin and makes you feel relaxed but still ready to go.
faceoff_positive.headline: Instant Classic!

faceoff_negative.comments: Used up plenty of tubes.  It is better than turbo wash but that's not saying much.  This lathers poorly.  Maybe it's better with a poof ball or rag:  I'm hands only.  A little or a lot serves you the same, so go easy and save your money on product.  Or better yet do not buy this to save more money.  Maybe it's good for sensitive skin as mine feels fine use after use.  Very mild scent, and a good one at that.  It's a decent beard wash and shampoo.  It's not to be a replacement for conditioner.  Although, it is better than JB's shampoo plus conditioner which is not saying much either.  That was a poor performer for my hair, big time.  This was okay if you condition separately.
faceoff_negative.headline: Rich
